issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > When I open Pinterest, initially a few pins and blank spots where ads appear are there. That's normal. But after a little bit of scrolling, everything disappears. Pins don't pop up anymore and occasionally I'll see outlines or pins trying to load as I scroll but ultimately nothing appears. This does seem to happen on the page recommending all types of pins instead of pages recommending pins for specific boards. ### Screenshots
